string.name: wp_problem_list_header_title_only_other_problems
string.context: The section header title in the problem list for when there is only a list of non-principal problems displayed

string.name: wp_problem_list_header_title_principal_problem
string.context: The section header title in the problem list for the principal problem

string.name: wp_problem_list_header_title_principal_problem_proxy
string.context: The section header title in the problem list for the principal problem. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_problem_list_header_title_other_problems
string.context: The section header title in the problem list for the other problems when there is also a principal problem shown

string.name: wp_problem_list_activity_title
string.context: The patient-friendly title for the hospital problem list, displayed in the navigation bar at the top of the view

string.name: wp_ed_problem_list_activity_title
string.context: The patient-friendly title for the ED problem list, displayed in the navigation bar at the top of the view

string.name: wp_problem_list_no_problems_show_message
string.context: The patient-friendly message that is displayed when there are no problems

resources.string: There are no health issues to display
